name: game-tracker
description: A Discord bot that helps you to track your stats in many games.

scripts.update: git pull origin master && npm i && npm run update:custom
scripts.update:force: git checkout -- package-lock.json && npm run update
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src/**/*.* --ignore src/commands/**/*.* --ignore src/utils/reloadme.json --exec ts-node src/core/start.ts

author: Federico 'EndBug' Grandi <fgrandi30@gmail.com>
